turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want to order a Starbucks espresso beverage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's a black and white mocha is what I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is the preferred pick up address?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the Starbucks on Blanding Boulevard in Orange Park, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order will be ready to be picked up soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you add whipped cream to that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, adding whipped cream to your espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that's that's what I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done. you will receive a message with your receipt.
